data.title: check if password is valid
data.statement:
You are given [[n]] conditions that the given password has to respect and you have to output "VALID" if the password respects all the conditions , "INVALID" if it doesn't and "ERROR" if the conditions contradict each other  i.e. if two conditions cannot be respected at the same time.
There are 4 types of conditions:
lengthMax : the length of the password should be less than or equal to lengthMax 
lengthMin: the length of the password should be more than or equal to lengthMin
include: the password should include at least one of the characters
exclude: the password should not include any of the characters

testCases.title: Test 5
testCases.testIn:
tVIDyBF/xz4j_:
7
lengthMin 5
lengthMax 15
include 0123456789_
include azertyuiopmlkjhgfdsqwxcvbn
include AZERTYUIOPMLKJHGFDSQWXCVBN
include !
exclude !;,?.

testCases.title: Validator 5
testCases.testIn:
tVIDyBF/xz4j_:
7
lengthMin 5
lengthMax 15
include 0123456789_
include azertyuiopmlkjhgfdsqwxcvbn
include AZERTYUIOPMLKJHGFDSQWXCVBN
include !_
exclude !;,?.

data.stubGenerator:
read password:string(100)
read N:int

loop N read condition:string(100)

write answer
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> a string [[password]] for the password to check
<<Line 2:>> an integer [[n]] for the number of conditions
<<Next [[n]] lines: >> two space separated strings, the name and value of the condition
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1 :>> contains one of the following options {{VALID}}, {{INVALID}} or {{ERROR}}.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You are given n conditions that the given password has to respect and you have to output "VALID" if the password respects all the conditions , "INVALID" if it doesn't and "ERROR" if the conditions contradict each other i.e. if two conditions cannot be respected at the same time.
There are 4 types of conditions:
lengthMax : the length of the password should be less than or equal to lengthMax
lengthMin: the length of the password should be more than or equal to lengthMin
include: the password should include at least one of the characters
exclude: the password should not include any of the characters
Input
Line 1: a string password for the password to check
Line 2: an integer n for the number of conditions
Next n lines: two space separated strings, the name and value of the condition
Output
Line 1 : contains one of the following options VALID, INVALID or ERROR.
Constraints
n >= 1
Example
Input
password
1
lengthMax 15
Output
VALID
